mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckillId", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.startTime", s.end_time "seckill.endTime", s.create_time "seckill.createTime" FROM success_killed sk , seckill s WHERE sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id AND sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId} AND sk.user_phone = #{userPhone};
